long_description: The beloved Patagonia Retro-X silhouette is now made in a soft, windproof hoodie style. When golden aspens rustle, it's time to reach for the reliable comfort of the Retro-X Cardigan. Made from plush, 0.5 in. recycled polyester fleece pile, the jacket has a nylon lining that completely shuts out wind. Zipper extends through to hood opening to secure the hood and protect lower face. Full-length zip with internal wind flap keeps out chilly gusts. Contrast Supplex(R) nylon binding around hood, center-front zipper, cuffs and hem add durability and eye-catching color hits. Zippered handwarmer pockets. Patagonia Retro-X jacket has a regular fit.
short_description: The beloved Patagonia Retro-X silhouette is now made in a soft, windproof hoodie style. When golden aspens rustle, it's time to reach for the reliable comfort of the Retro-X Cardigan.
